original_title: Wu Tang Clan: Disciples of the 36 Chambers
overview: The Wu-Tang Clan reunites with all 9 original members to perform and headline Chapter 11 of the Rock The Bells Festival in San Bernardino, CA on July 17, 2004, which featured Redman, Dilated Peoples, and more on the same bill.
title: Wu Tang Clan: Disciples of the 36 Chambers
